org.sakaiproject.sms.api
Interface SmsScheduler

public interface SmsScheduler

Use Quartz to run at predefined intervals to process the SMS task queue. The service can run in a concurrent environment.

Version:
1.0
Author:
louis@psybergate.com

Method Summary
 java.util.Date getLastProcessTime()
          Get the time of the last run.

          Get the current status of the scheduler.

          Fire on timer to process the task queue.

          Force a immediate process of the message queue.

          Set the interval of the scheduler.
 

Method Detail

getLastProcessTime

java.util.Date getLastProcessTime()
Get the time of the last run. For diagnostic purposes.

getStatus

int getStatus()
Get the current status of the scheduler.

processQueue

void processQueue()
Fire on timer to process the task queue. Apply row locking on message queue. Use the sms service to process the request. Use the SmsCore service to do the actual work.

processQueueNow

void processQueueNow()
Force a immediate process of the message queue.

setInterval

void setInterval(int seconds)
Set the interval of the scheduler.

insertIntoDebugLog

void insertIntoDebugLog()
